channel.title: Uncategorized on Leonardo Borges

item.title: help stop the ie money drain
item.description: I'm a big heavy metal fan. And so are most of my friends. As a result I launched RottingNames, a band name generator that will generate the most hilarious, nastiest and nonsense names the metal world is yet to discover - ok, that's probably a bit of an overstatement but the idea is good. However, a friend pointed out the code had a bug when running under - gasp - Internet Explorer.
